Org.OData.Temporal.V1.@Core.LongDescription: *This is a working draft that may incompatibly change any time.*

ApplicationTimeSupport.@Core.Description: This entity set or navigation property supports temporal requests

ObjectKey.@Core.Description: The set of primitive properties that identify a temporal object
ObjectKey.@Core.LongDescription: A temporal object is a set of facts whose change over application and/or system time is tracked by the service. The entities of the annotated collection are time slices of potentially multiple temporal objects. A temporal object is uniquely identified within this set by the values of the specified object key properties. Object key properties follow the same rules as entity key properties. If no object key is specified, the annotated collection only contains time slices for a single one temporal object.

CollectionKindSnapshot.@Core.Description: Each OData entity represents a snapshot of data at a point in application time that is the same for all entities in the collection
CollectionKindSnapshot.@Core.LongDescription: The point in application time is defined by the `$at` clause of a request; default is the current point in time.

CollectionKindTimeSlice.@Core.Description: Each OData entity represents data during an interval of application time; it is called a *time slice*
CollectionKindTimeSlice.@Core.LongDescription:
Entities in a temporal collection of this kind are said to *overlap*
          if the intervals defined by their `TimeSliceStart` and `TimeSliceEnd` properties overlap
          and their other, *non-temporal*, key properties are identical.
          A temporal collection of this kind MUST NOT contain overlapping entities;
          and if it contains an entity, it MUST contain all entities
          that agree with the given one in their non-temporal key properties.

TimeSliceStart.@Core.Description: Property containing lower boundary of a time slice

TimeSliceEnd.@Core.Description: Property containing upper boundary of a time slice

PeriodKindDateTimeOffset.@Core.Description: Period start and end are of type Edm.DateTimeOffset

Precision.@Core.Description: Precision of Edm.DateTimeOffset values for period start and end

PeriodKindDate.@Core.Description: Period start and end are of type Edm.Date

ClosedClosedPeriods.@Core.Description: If `true`, the period end is included in the time period

QualifiedActionName.@Core.Description: The qualified name of an action in scope.

Update.@Core.Description: Adds time slices to a time-slice collection, splitting and updating other time slices in order to avoid overlap

$Parameter.@Core.Description: Collection of time slices to be updated with additional time slices
Time slices to be merged into the `timeslices` collection
$Parameter.@Core.LongDescription: Same entity type as binding parameter.

$ReturnType.@Core.LongDescription: Same entity type as binding parameter.

Upsert.@Core.Description: Upserts a temporal object in a given period of application time after splitting partially overlapping time slices by updating existing time slices in that period and creating new time slices to close gaps in that period

$Parameter.@Core.Description: Time slices to modify
Lower boundary (inclusive) of application time. Date or DateTimeOffset value, or string with value `min`
Upper boundary (exclusive) of application time. Date or DateTimeOffset value, or string with value `max`
Property values to insert or update
$Parameter.@Core.LongDescription: Same entity type as binding parameter and return type, specify only values of non-key properties.

$Parameter.@Core.Description: Property values that identify a single temporal object
$Parameter.@Core.LongDescription: Select-expand projection of the same entity type as binding parameter, containing all and only properties reference in the [`ObjectKey`](#ObjectKey) of that entity type.

$ReturnType.@Core.LongDescription: Same entity type as binding parameter.

UpdateFrom.@Core.Description: Updates properties of time slices of a temporal object from a given point in time onwards and stops updating a property if its original value changes from one time slice to the next

$Parameter.@Core.Description: Time slices to modify
Lower boundary (inclusive) of application time. Date or DateTimeOffset value, or string with value `min`
Optional upper boundary (exclusive) of application time. Date or DateTimeOffset value, or string with value `max`
Property values to update
$Parameter.@Core.LongDescription: Same entity type as binding parameter and return type, specify only values of non-key properties.

$Parameter.@Core.Description: Property values that identify a single temporal object
$Parameter.@Core.LongDescription: Select-expand projection of the same entity type as binding parameter, containing all and only properties reference in the [`ObjectKey`](#ObjectKey) of that entity type.

$ReturnType.@Core.LongDescription: Same entity type as binding parameter.

Synchronize.@Core.Description: Synchronizes time slices of a temporal object to match the provided full application timeline

$Parameter.@Core.Description: Time slices to modify
List of time slices covering the full timeline of the temporal object
$Parameter.@Core.LongDescription: Same entity type as the binding parameter.

$Parameter.@Core.Description: Property values that identify a single temporal object
$Parameter.@Core.LongDescription: Select-expand projection of the same entity type as binding parameter, containing all and only properties reference in the [`ObjectKey`](#ObjectKey) of that entity type.

Delete.@Core.Description: Deletes all time slices of a temporal object in a given period of application time after splitting partially overlapping time slices

$Parameter.@Core.Description: Time slices to modify
Lower boundary (inclusive) of application time. Date or DateTimeOffset value, or string with value `min`
Upper boundary (exclusive) of application time. Date or DateTimeOffset value, or string with value `max`
Property values that identify a single temporal object
$Parameter.@Core.LongDescription: Select-expand projection of the same entity type as binding parameter, containing all and only properties reference in the [`ObjectKey`](#ObjectKey) of that entity type.

$ReturnType.@Core.LongDescription: Same entity type as binding parameter.

DeleteFrom.@Core.Description: Deletes  time slices of a temporal object from a a given point in application time onwards and stops if a property changes its value from one time slice to the next

$Parameter.@Core.Description: Time slices to modify
Lower boundary (inclusive) of application time. Date or DateTimeOffset value, or string with value `min`
Optional upper boundary (exclusive) of application time. Date or DateTimeOffset value, or string with value `max`
Property values that identify a single temporal object
$Parameter.@Core.LongDescription: Select-expand projection of the same entity type as binding parameter, containing all and only properties reference in the [`ObjectKey`](#ObjectKey) of that entity type.

$ReturnType.@Core.LongDescription: Same entity type as binding parameter.
